title: Six Senses Zighy Bay Named Best Overseas Hotel Spa By The Readers Of Condé Nast Traveller, Uk
text:
Email 
Six Senses Spa at Six Senses Zighy Bay has added another accolade to its list of recognitions and was ranked No. 1 by of UK Condé Nast Traveller magazine’s in the Readers’ Travel Awards overseas hotel spas category this year. 
The summary of award winners appears in the October edition of Condé Nast Traveller with Six Senses Spa at Six Senses Zighy Bay also placing in the magazine’s prestigious list of The World’s Top 100 along with sister property Six Senses Yao Noi in Thailand. Online questionnaires from Condé Nast Traveller were distributed to their readers from March 5 to May 4, 2015 asking them to vote for the things they love most about travel, from holiday hotels to destination spas, airlines and cruise lines. 
“To receive top honors from such a well-traveled audience is a great honor for Six Senses Zighy Bay. An award such as this is really a tribute to the commitment of our hosts at Six Senses Spa in particular and Six Senses Zighy Bay in general, who every day, strive to exceed the expectations of our guests. We are committed to delivering quality wellness experiences which combine innovative and ancient holistic treatments with a rich talent base supported by in-house experts and visiting wellness practitioners,” said John Philipson, general manager of Six Senses Zighy Bay and area vice president. Six Senses Zighy Bay in the Sultanate of Oman 
A refuge for mind and body; Six Senses Spa at Zighy Bay is a sanctuary of ultimate well-being committed to delivering integrated wellness experiences. The spa includes nine treatment rooms, a juice bar and two Arabian hammams. It focuses on holistic and wellness programs plus a full menu of local and signature treatments delivered by skilled international therapists. Adventures on offer include exploring the culture of Oman and the buzz of arrival by paraglide, with tours to suit active guests or those who prefers to sit back and relax – taking in all the destination has to offer.
